description: WDP Pipeline Flow UI Schema. Defines UI-only constructs for pipeline flow documents.

zoom.description: X/Y pan and scale amounts for the canvas.

comments.description: Array of Comments, optionally associated with nodes

oneOf.description: Deprecated - use zoom object instead. Scale factor as a percentage. 100% is standard scale amount. Smaller values zoom out. Larger values zoom in.
A zoom object containing translation and scale amounts.

x.description: Horizontal translation amount. Positive value moves right, negative to the left.

y.description: Vertical translation amount. Positive value moves down, negative moves up.

k.description: Scale amount. 1.0 is the standard scale amount. Smaller values zoom out. Larger values zoom in.

cardinality.description: Property to capture how many data assets are allowed for this port, e.g., min: 1, max:1 implies you must supply 1 and only 1; min:0, max:1 implies it is optional and a max of one, min:0, max:-1 means it is optional and you can may have any number of data assets. The default value is 1:1 for inputs and 1:-1 for outputs.

min.description: Minimum data sets that are required for this port

max.description: Maximum data sets that are allowed on this port. A negative value indicates unlimited. The default value is 1 for inputs and -1 for outputs.

style.description: A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the port.
A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the node.

image.description: URL to image source. Although a data URL can be used to embed an image inline, it is not recommended. The 'image' property can also be a JSX object that displays an image using an <svg> element however, JSX images must be set programmatically and cannot be stringified into JSON.

is_expanded.description: Indicates whether a supernode is shown in expanded state or as a regular node.

expanded_height.description: Height of expanded supernode. If not provided an appropriate height is calculated.

expanded_width.description: Width of expanded supernode. If not provided an appropriate width is calculated.

is_resized.description: Indicates whether a node has been resized or not. If true, resize_width and resize_height are used for node display. If false, the default width and height are used.

resize_height.description: Height of resized node. The node will be displayed with this height, when is_resized is true, in preference to its default height.

resize_width.description: Width of resized node. The node will be displayed with this width, when is_resized is true, in preference to its default width.

sub_pipelines.description: An array of pipelines referenced when this node is a supernode. This field is only used when the supernode is in a palette or on the clipboard. It will be an empty array when the supernode references an external pipeline.

messages.description: An array of messages for the node

ui_parameters.description: UI only parameter values for the node

palette_image.description: Image name for the node displayed in palette. If omitted the image from 'image' field will be used.

palette_class_name.description: CSS class name applied to the <div> shown in palette for the node

palette_disabled.description: Indicates whether the node in the palette is disabled. If true, prevents the node being dragged or double-clicked from palette.

decorations.description: Array of decorations used to decorate nodes

style.description: A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the node to node link.

decorations.description: Array of decorations used to decorate node links

class_name.description: CSS class name for link styling

style.description: A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the association link.

decorations.description: Array of decorations used to decorate association links

node_decoration_def.description: Decoration used to decorate a node

position.description: Indicates an anchor point on the node at which the decoration will be displayed.

link_decoration_def.description: Decoration used to decorate a link

position.description: Indicates an anchor point on the link at which the decoration will be displayed.

distance.description: Only applicable to straight link lines. Will move the decoration the specified number of pixels from its 'position'.

image_decoration_def.description: Image decoration properties including shared properties.

image.description: Image displayed at the decoration position. Provide either this or a label.

outline.description: If true and outline is drawn around the image.

label_decoration_def.description: Label decoration properties including shared properties.

label.description: Label displayed at the decoration position. Provide either this or an image.

label_editable.description: If true, the label decoration can be edited. It displays an edit icon which can be clicked to enter edit mode.

label_single_line.description: If true, the label is displayed as a single line and is truncated at the width.

label_max_characters.description: The maximum number of characters that can be entered in the label decoration when it is editable.

label_allow_return_key.description: If false, pressing the return key in edit mode will not do anything: label will wrap at width. If true, return will enter a newline character.

shape_decoration_def.description: Shape decoration properties including shared properties.

path.description: An SVG path that describes a shape to be drawn at the decoration position.

jsx_decoration_def.description: JSX decoration properties including shared properties These are never serialized in the pipeline flow.

jsx.description: A JSX expression that will be used to display the content of the decoration.

decoration_shared_properties.description: Shared properties across all types of decoration.

id.description: A unique identifier used to identify the decoration

x_pos.description: X position of the decorator relative to the decorations's position field.

y_pos.description: Y position of the decorator relative to the decorations's position field.

hotspot.description: Indicates whether the decorator is a hotspot or not. If true, it calls sends an event to the host app. when clicked

class_name.description: CSS class name for decoration styling. It can be a space-separated list of classes.

temporary.description: If set to true, the decoration will not be serialized in the pipeline flow.

focusable.description: Indicates whether the decoration can receive keyboard focus or not.

id_ref.description: Name of the parameter that has the message

validation_id.description: Validation identifier from the fail_message validation section.

class_name.description: CSS class(es) to apply to the comment

style.description: A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the comment.

attributes.description: Optional attributes to be added to this element. For example: "attributes": "attr1='value1'; attr2='value2'"

content_type.description: The type of content either regular or markdown or WYSIWYG

associated_id_refs.description: Optional array of associated node id references

class_name.description: CSS class name for link styling

style.description: A 'style spec' object containing CSS strings to be applied to the SVG objects of the comment link.
